attributes.value: Respects power
Values honesty
Sees guile and cunning as indirect and somewhat worthless
Finds the ideas of independence and freedom somewhat foolish
Sees concealment of emotions as a betrayal and tries her best never to associate with such secretive fools
Sees the pursuit of good craftsmanship as a total waste
Is quick to form negative views about things
Is very slow to anger
Is confident under pressure
Has great trouble mastering fear when confronted by danger
Is generally quite confident of her abilities when undertaking specific ventures
Likes to present herself boldly, even if it would offend an average sense of modesty
Is somewhat scatterbrained
Is a pessimist
Is incurious and never seeks out knowledge or information to satisfy herself
Is not a private person and freely shares details of her life
Is inattentive to detail in her own work
Easily changes her mind and will generally go with the prevailing view on anything
Has a strong sense of duty
Can get caught up in internal deliberations when action is necessary
Only rarely tries to assert herself in conversation
Actively avoids exciting or stressful situations
Has a tendency to consider ideas and abstractions over practical applications
Tough
Rarely sick
Poor focus
A good spatial sense
A very good feel for social relationships
